Index entries for continued fractions for constants

mathematica: ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[113], 300] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 11 2011*)CoefficientList[Series[(10 + x + x^2 + x^3 + 2 x^4 + 2 x^5 + x^6 + x^7 + x^8 + 10 x^9) / (1 - x^9), {x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 13 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA)  I:=[10, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 1, 1, 1, 20]; [n le 10 select I[n] else Self(n-9): n in [1..80]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 14 2013
